summary.para: Gets the paint color that is used if the paint type is D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE_COLOR.

param.name: color
param.para: The paint color that is used if the paint type is D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE_COLOR.

summary.para: Gets the element id which acts as the paint server. This id is used if the paint type is D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE_URI.

param.name: id
param.para: The element id which acts as the paint server.

returns.para: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Gets the string length of the element id which acts as the paint server. This id is used if the paint type is D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE_URI.

returns.para: the string length of the element id which acts as the paint server. The returned string length does not include room for the null terminator.

summary.para: Sets the paint color that is used if the paint type is D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE_COLOR.

returns.para: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Sets the paint color that is used if the paint type is D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE_COLOR.

returns.para: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Sets the element id which acts as the paint server. This id is used if the paint type is D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE_URI.

param.name: id
param.para: The element id which acts as the paint server. This id is used if the paint type is D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE_URI.

returns.para: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Interface describing an SVG fill or stroke value.
